long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Drive Video Editor lets you edit videos directly on your Google Drive.üé•‚ú®

Our Google Drive video editor makes it super easy to edit videos on your Drive. No watermarks! Whether you're editing Instagram reels, TikTok videos, or YouTube Shorts, our online video editor has got you covered.

Need help? Found a bug? Have an idea for improvements?
Let us know here: https://driveeditor.com/#contact

If you're a social media reposter, a freelance video editor, or a marketer, this tool helps you edit video clips in seconds. If you want to apply the same edits to multiple videos just copy and paste editing presets for faster edits. Perfect for repurposing and reusing content and avoiding shadow bans and 0 view "jail"! üì≤

Frequently Asked Questions

‚ùìCan I copy and paste my edits?
- Yes! Use it if you need to apply the same editing preset on multiple videos.

‚ùìCan I remove video metadata?
- Yes! Click on the Remove button to clear video metadata for better privacy.

‚ùìWhat video formats are supported by the extension?
- The extension supports popular video formats such as MP4, MOV, AVI, and MKV. If you encounter any issues with a specific format, please refer to the support for more details.

‚ùìIs there a limit to the size or length of the videos I can edit?
- The extension is designed to handle most standard video files. However, performance may vary based on the size and length of the video, as well as your device‚Äôs capabilities. For optimal performance, we recommend using videos under 100MB and shorter than 10 minutes.

Limitations:

Due to video codec limitations of Google Drive, the Drive Video Editor extension will not be able to export videos which are uploaded to your Drive from CapCut video editor. 

Try our video cutter and video trimmer today to edit, save and share awesome short form video content right in your Drive!
